findings.liver: Normal in size with smooth contour. An 8mm slightly T2 hyperintense focus in segment 4A, likely representing a summation shadow, atypical hemangioma, or a granuloma.
findings.biliary: Gallbladder within normal limits, no significant intra or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation.
findings.pancreas: Normal signal intensity and bulk, no ductal dilatation or mass lesions. A punctate T2 hyperintense nonenhancing focus in tail of pancreas suggestive of a side branch IPMN.
findings.spleen: Normal in size and homogeneous characteristics.
findings.kidneys: Normal in size with symmetric contrast enhancement. Several punctate T2 hyperintense non-enhancing lesions consistent with cysts.
findings.gastrointestinal_tract: Moderate size hiatal hernia, stomach under distended.
findings.lymph_nodes: Enlarged nodes in porta hepatis measuring up to 1.7 x 3.8 cm, unchanged from prior.
findings.osseous_and_soft_tissue_structures: No concerning osseous lesions. Several T2 hyperintense hemangiomas in thoracic spine.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Enlarged nodes in porta hepatis unchanged from prior.
